content.text:
# List of Rijksmonuments in Gelderland

This is a list of rijksmonuments in Gelderland that have articles on the English language Wikipedia.
A
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! Rijksmonument
! Type
! Location
! Description
! Photo
|-
| De Drie Waaien, Afferden
| Windmill
| Afferden
| A tower mill built in 1869, restored to working order.
|
|-
| Schoonoord, Alverna
| Windmill
| Alverna
| A tower mill built in 1887, restored to working order.
|
|-
| Het Loo Palace
| Palace
| Apeldoorn
| A Dutch Baroque palace built in 1686, Now a Rijksmuseum.
|
|-
| Het Oude Loo
| Castle
| Apeldoorn
| A castle built in the 15th century, used as guest accommodation by the Dutch royal family.
|
|-
| Koningin Juliana Toren
| Tower
| Apeldoorn
| A tower built in 1910 to celebrate the birth of Prinses Juliana the previous year.
|
|-
| De Hoop
| Windmill
| Arnhem
| A tower mill built in 1846, restored to working order.
|
|-
| De Kroon
| Windmill
| Arnhem
| A tower mill built in 1870, restored to working order.
|
|-
| St Eusebius' Church
| Church
| Arnhem
| A Gothic church built between the mid-15th and mid-16th centuries.
|
|-
| Agnietenkapel / Waalse kerk
| Church
| Arnhem
| 15th-century convent chapel that later became the Walloon church
|
|}

| Hotel
